long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a browser extension that aggregates links from a Zendesk ticket according to custom RegEx values. This tool's purpose is to help Zendesk users more easily handle long tickets where links and/or attachments are key information.

PLEASE NOTE: this extension requires that you specify patterns in RegEx. If you are unfamiliar with RegEx, this extension is likely not for you.

For a full list of features or to report an issue, please see the GitHub repo: https://github.com/BagToad/Zendesk-Link-Collector
